::KitKat::

She frowned and slowed up a bit.  She knew he was right.  But she 
wante to have a little fun.  Oh well, she thought, maybe later on 
then.  She loped along with Rowdy.  She looked around. She was hoping 
to find some food, a rabbit or something. 



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Talon Harvilicz" <wilddance_mare@h...> 
wrote:
> Rowdy Wolf:
> 
> 
> Rowdy Wolf galloped lightly after KitKat. "Perhaps it's best you 
save your 
> energy. Stealth is the best way." he said to her.
>
